database - package database
 
dateIsOnWeekend(LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime) - Static method in class helper.Validation
Checks if the date falls on a weekend and shows an error alert if it does.
dateIsOutsideBusinessHours(LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime) - Static method in class helper.Validation
Checks if the appointment time is outside business hours or on a weekend and shows an error alert if it is.
dateTimeLocalTo24(String) - Static method in class helper.Time
Converts a local time string in the format "yyyy-MM-dd hh:mma" to 24-hour format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss".
